[Home](./index.md) &gt; [xspattern](./xspattern.md)

## xspattern package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [compile(pattern, options)](./xspattern.compile.md) | Compiles the given pattern into a matching function. The returned function accepts a single string and returns true iff the pattern matches it. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [MatchFn](./xspattern.matchfn.md) | A function used to validate strings against the pattern it represents. Accepts a single string and returns a boolean indicating whether it matches the pattern. |
|  [Options](./xspattern.options.md) | Options to control pattern compilation.<!-- -->Currently, only a language option is supported, defaulting to 'xsd'. Set this to 'xpath' to compile the pattern with XPath syntax and semantics. Note that not all XPath-specific features are currently supported. See https://github.com/bwrrp/xspattern.js/issues/9 for details. |
